Class Font

java.lang.Object
  net.petterroea.starterkit.Font

public class Font
extends java.lang.Object

This class enables you to create custom fonts for use in the game.

Author:
petterroea

Method Detail

draw

public void draw(java.awt.Graphics g,
                 int x,
                 int y,
                 java.lang.String text,
                 FontShader shader)
Draws a string to the selected x and y coordinates. I am too lazy to support newline.

Parameters:
g - The graphics object
x - The x coordinate
y - The y coordinate
text - The string to be written to the screen
shader - The FontShader object. It is not actually a shader
